content: Too many commercials. It's as bad as cable at this point. Why bother paying for a subscription that doesn't offer a quality service? Can't turn off auto play, then can't remove the shows it started from your 'continue watching' section. Can't stop the awful suggestions of shows on the home screen, users should be able to hit shows with a "stop recommending" option for certain shows and movies. Canceled.

Update 2/2024: app crashes less frequently, but all of the other issues are still present. Ie: why can't I access more than just my most recently played episode of a show without searching for the whole series? Every other streaming service I use, from HBO to Disney+, including free, ad-supported services, allows me to access additional episodes. Search feature also sucks. Finishing what's on my to-watch list and then canceling. They've had time to improve and have chosen to not improve the UI.

This app desperately needs an update. If I'm watching a show and try to close the app it freezes the screen and makes all button functions useless. The only solution is to completely restart my phone. This has been going on for at least a month. With how competitive streaming services are right now I wouldn't ignore these complaints. I'll be canceling my subscription until this is resolved.

Easily one of the most infuriating, malfunctioning streaming services I've ever used. Every time I try to open it, it takes so long that often my TV will just auto-shut off instead. I have to uninstall and reinstall the entire app the majority of the times I want to use it. Absolutely detest that society is moving toward streaming services that only get more expensive and less usable.
replyContent: We’re sorry to hear about your interrupted experience, Riley. We’d like to look into this for you! Please send us an email at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: It is BEYOND frustrating, with what I pay for this subscription, that I cannot remove programs from 'Continue Watching'. Especially if it was an auto-play show that I didn't exit out of in time. I should not have to go to the shows page, click the last episode & fast-forward through it to remove it from my Continue Watching. The issue is that when that show resumes, it's still in my Continue Watching. PLEASE fix this!

This is literally THE WORST streaming service. I cannot watch one single episode of anything without it pausing or freezing sometimes as much as 20 times in an hour! I have looked into this issue and found SO MANY other people have the same issue and yet you apparently don't want to do anything to fix it. If you valued your customers who pay to use your streaming service you should want to provide a decent service. It's mind-blowing a company like this can't produce a well running app!

The app works fine for videos and has what you would expect from a streaming service. The issue I have is unlike any other streaming app like YouTube, Hulu, and Amazon to name a few. The app bugs out when you try to have it in small window mode even before opening another app it starts bugging out. For me, it blacks out my screen and I either have to lock and unlock my phone or reset it completely. Once that bug is fixed I could see the app being 5 stars.
replyContent: Hello Nicholas. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Besides all the glitching, the crashing, the frustratingly slow navigation and loading, and the 6 minutes of ad time before each movie, the selection is usually terrible. Most of these movies are available on free platforms with less loading time, less ad watching time, better navigation and no crashing. With that being said it's a miracle that Peacock still has a customer base. I'm not hating on it, just reporting my experience.
replyContent: Hello Andrew. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Lots of freezing during shows. Have to get out of Peacock, go into another app, and go back in. Sometimes I have to do this multiple times during one show! I do not have this issue with other streaming services. It starts a new program immediately when what I'm watching ends, and if I am able to cancel it, I miss the last tiny bit of what I am watching. Also need to be able to remove from the "continue watching" row! So many freaking shows that started, even if stopped quickly. Disappointing

There is no way to turn off auto play so if you're watching the last episode it automatically plays done random show and then shows under the "continue watching" section forever. Also, if you're streaming to a TV from the app, after a while you can no longer control anything from the app because it shows as disconnect even though it's still playing on the TV. Some serious work is needed!

Of all streaming apps I have this is the one that works the least across all my devices. Freezes on my PS4, locks out my phone, glitches if I try to back out while it's still playing, doesn't pause music if it's playing before, doesn't pause if an alarm goes off. Terrible app but it's a monopoly that is the only one that has shows I want.
replyContent: Hi Ethan! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Love the app, but autoplay is annoying. Turn off the autoplay of the next show or please give the option to turn it off. GET RID OF AUTOPLAY NOW. It would make a lot of us like using the app. It's frustrating to have to go to the last episode to get a show out of our continue watching section. I don't think it did this before. When I started using the app, It would let you preview shows after our show ended, it didn't play the next show. I gave a 2 star for the stupid autoplay.

Good selections and quality overall, but the picture-in-picture function works maybe one time out of ten. It usually glitches and freezes my phone until I lock the screen and reopen. Also, as other users have noted, please stop automatically playing different shows or movies when we finish something. Good app for the most part but frequently glitchy and some features put user preferences dead last.
replyContent: Hello Laurie! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: The worst app I have ever used. Sometimes when you finish your 90 second ad, it simply decides to refresh and play another full minute. Peacock attempted to completely block the Daytona 24 race with incessant ads. Not to mention if you try to leave the app while something is playing, peacock seizes your entire device. you cannot go back, you can't leave. it even disables your power button, preventing emergency shutoff and forcing the battery to run out. I hope the employees get what they deserve
replyContent: Hi Alex! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: DO NOT INSTALL OR USE THIS APP! This app is awful. It locks up your entire device and frequently requires a total reboot to regain control of your phone. In addition, almost impossible to cancel your subscription. I have an email in to support, but they don't seem willing to allow me to cancel. I may have to cancel my credit card to stop paying them.
replyContent: Hi Michael! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Update as of January 2024 it no longer will do the smaller screen when going to another app. It literally glitches and freezes my entire phone everytime I exit out of the app! Only reason I have it is because of the office and parks and rec (we need raising hope). It's always been with commercials but they would be a couple like 20 second ones. The past month or so the commercials are 70+ seconds and there's like 6+ per 20 min episode which is insain for a streaming app...that I pay for!!

Picture-in-picture faulty and unreliable. While watching in app, I press my home button to go to pic-in-pic and the screen malfunctions/freezes, and I have to lock my screen, then go back into the app, wait a few seconds and then go to Home again for p-in-p to work (sometimes this doesn't work though). Also doesn't autoplay next episode during picture-in-picture... I have to open the app and continue with the glitches all over again.

I think the streaming service itself is decent, the Peacock original content is excellent, and I watch a lot of the NBC first-run & movie content enough to justify the cost. The App is buggy, though. I routinely have to clear my cashe and restart my chromebox(ditto on my kindle, but not my android phone) because the app wont deploy or it crashes when I push play. :/ 7.5/10 recommend

Good content but the app itself is buggy and has less features then other streaming services. For example the picture in picture mode often does not work right causing the app to crash and have to be restarted which sometimes means watching adds several times in a row cause it crashes on a commercial. You also can't clear your continue watching section which is a huge bummer when a show you don't care about auto plays then sits in your continue watching forever.

I've had this app for awhile now and it sucks. I almost exclusively use it on the TV. Constant crashing even when you just skip intro. And don't let the screen saver come on. You'll either have to restart your TV or close the app and clear the cache to get it to play again. Lots of stuttering during play. No way to skip, just fast forward or reverse which moves very fast so it is difficult to move forward and back with any presicion.

This is the most frustrating tv app ever. There is constant skipping when trying to select a show. The audio issue of describing everything is awful, you have to change it with every show and even after pausing it. Doesn't allow you to see an updated continue watching list, can't change the priority of shows, so many things. I rarely watch it because of these issues. I just started watching because the NBC shows started back. I've watched 3 episodes and I'm already ready to throw my remote.

App messes up badly, and I was a premium user. For a few months, but the past 2 have been horrible. It keeps 'continue watching' at random episodes/seasons of things in watching in order. I use the firestick app to control all of my shows. Some shows I watch on prime, but when I go to watch it, it starts up randomly on peacock at some episodes and season I haven't seen yet. It won't shut off when I stop the episodes. The sound keeps going even though I'm in the prime menu.
replyContent: Hello! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: love the shows.but so many issues with buffering.makes watching a show very frustrating. app just stopped working in the middle of my show. now it wont load at all! I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling, but it still won't load. I've even unplugged the Chromecast from the wall as well as the TV and it still won't load. I have no other issues with any of my other apps.
replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Sari. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: I'm not sure why, but the app has been really buggy and not working properly. Every time I go and minimize it, it would usually keep playing in the corner but now it freezes up my entire phone when I do that and I have to lock an unlock my phone for it to go back to the big screen and exit out of it instead of being able to keep playing it minimized on the bottom corner of my screen. It also makes my three bottom navigation buttons literally disappear after the app decides it wants to glitch.
replyContent: Hi Alejandra! We’d like to hear more about your experience and investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your account details.

content: The app is great, I don't mind it at all and the interface is easy to use but there seems to be a big which isn't allowing me up minimize the player while using other apps, which is extremely annoying in 2024. Is this supposed to be some sort of thing like the YouTube premium, where you've got to pay for the additional service to minimize the player? If so, I think it's silly.
replyContent: Hello Ja'Marcus or Brienn! We’d like to hear more about your experience and investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your account details.

content: I'm completely unable to even load the app now. I'm on a Samsung Galaxy S10e phone (I'm about to get S24+). I've cleared cache, run "optimize device" to close all bkgd apps. There's plenty of RAM & HD space. But it just crashes every time. I'm also upset b/c I signed up for Premium as a deal that came with my internet provider. I wrote to Google & they refunded a single month, but I keep getting charged for it.
replyContent: Hello Carrie! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Fix it already! I have a brand new s23 ultra. It's an amazing phone and up to date on all software. For the life of me I can't understand why this issue with running a picture while other apps are running still isn't fixed. Half your users have androids. My phone doesn't need to be configured to work with your app...your app needs to be able to work for us. I use the app while also doing other things on my phone and picture in picture either freezes or forces me to restart my phone!!
replyContent: Hi Anca! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Although they offer some good programming, at times I have noticed that they remove regular programming from their live channel lineup. This has included some news feeds from MSNBC, etc. Unfortunately there is no customer/technical support available, only a knowledge-based help site and an AI system that goes by the knowledge-based help. I only use the app because they are cheap. Once they raise their prices, I don't think it will be worth it at all. There are other better choices out there.

Paid premium version has potential but needs improvements. The content is great. App itself is frustrating. There is no way to save your favorite channels. You have scroll through the many many channels in the guide to go from channel to channel. If you stop scrolling for a millisecond, it resets and goes back to the beginning or it gets glitchy and gets stuck, forcing you start over again. It makes it impossible to find my local NBC channel as it's at the bottom of the guide. So frustrating!!

90% of the time I can't get the app to actually open and play the show I want to watch. The app will open, I go to "My Shows", then click on the show I want to watch and it doesn't actually play. Nothing comes up, it's a black screen of death. I've tried clearing the browser cache and history multiple times, restarting the computer, restarting the app, and nothing! So frustrating!!
replyContent: Hi! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: BEWARE: While the content is great, the app has been crashing constantly lately. The screen just turns black and never loads anything. I tried the same as numerous other people have reviewed here, deleting and re-installing the app completely, but it doesn't fix it. This is clearly a bug within the app itself since it's happening to others as well. Peacock PLEASE fix this so I don't have to cancel my subscription!😥
replyContent: Hi Rebecca! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: This app has really been messing up lately. I'm torn between keeping it and terminating it. It has so many shows that I love to watch, but if I can't watch them anymore then what's the point. It constantly crashes! Ive tried the whole uninstall and reinstall it stuff like they say any time you contact customer service and it hasnt helped. They really need to get it together and fix whatever bug they have or else they're going to end up losing a lot of business.
replyContent: Hi Jessica. We’re sorry to hear about your interrupted experience. We’d like to look into this for you! Please send us an email at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Other reviews mention loading issues and the app not working properly, but I have never had a problem with it. I have it on my Android phone, my Roku TV and with a Roku streaming stick. My only issue is that things only stay in the continue watching list for about a week and I have memory issues. So once they're gone, I forget I was watching them. And then when I go to the series again, it restarts at season 1 episode 1. That's frustrating!

PLEASE make it easier to remove shows from "continue watching"! Sometimes I start something, decide I don't like it, but stuck with it in continue watching list! Unlike others, shows tend to stay there! Also app needs the option to turn on/off Auto Play! I hate that if I fall asleep it continues playing, sometimes things I don't want to watch!

Worst apps of ANY streaming service!! The app here on my phone is "okay" it's not great. It has horrible troubles saving movies to my list. It's VERY annoying. I also have it on my FireStick and that app is basically USELESS. I spent forever going through every movie and added so many to my list. The next day I went to check my list and there was like 10 movies on there!! The list is definitely longer on my phone so I can look there to pick a movie thank goodness. It's very frustrating though

The app constantly crashes, whether it's live TV or other programming. It's very frustrating and especially during a football game (if I can get the app to even work). Good luck watching the football game that's only being streamed on Peacock. My app is updated, and I've even uninstalled and installed it on both my phone and TV. It doesn't help. The app still constantly crashes.

I love the shows and movies that peacock offers, but the app doesn't work well with Android. You can't watch it in mini mode like with Amazon, YouTube or Netflix to answer a text message. And sometimes if I get a call or message while a video plays, my phone freezes up and doesn't respond. My phone is only two years old and it's updated to the latest version of Android. If they update peacock to be more friendly, I'll change my score to 5 stars.
replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Paige. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Works fine on roku and firestick. But mobile messes up my entire phone. When I have Peacock running and I hit my phones home button, which usually minimizes the screen so I can still watch and do other things, it completely glitches out my phone and removes my phones button options on the bottom. It happened almost 10 minutes ago, and I'm typing this up, and I still don't have the option to go back, home, etc. Very frustrating

I'm more than likely going to cancel my subscription to this app. I'm paying for streaming that I can't use because of how poorly this app functions. It rarely opens without my having to constantly restart my device. When it finally does work (barely), it crashes and stops working. Avoid paying for and downloading this app. It's clear that the developers aren't listening to the frustrations of the consumers.
replyContent: Hi Vanessa! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: The "Continue watching" tab appears randomly, sometimes it's there, sometimes it's not, which is very frustrating, if you found a show you like, you want to just go there and watch, not go to "My Stuff" (because you have to look through long list) or go to search and type in the show you want to watch. Each of the latter is more time consuming.

Update: I can see many people are saying the same thing so it sounds like something they should fix. Although the content is great, I had to update my review because now it requires uninstall/reinstall near more than a few times a week. I have even had to do it multiple times in 1 weekend. I can't imagine they will be able to afford to keep the content w/o subscribers. Very inconsistent & buggy. I am uninstalling & re-installing all the time. Great content, just wish the app worked consistently.
replyContent: Hi Clarissa. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: I wouldnt recommend this at all. I couldnt find anything good to watch, but i kept it for the football. The thing is that everytime i try to watch football, the app locks up and requires me to close the app again and again until it finally decides to work. I have missed sizable portions of numerous games because of this. Not worth the time anymore.

*Update on 12/2023* They have not fixed anything. Still buffers extremely often and never finishes buffering and will skip ahead a great deal amount. DON'T BUY UNLESS THERE IS NO OTHER VIEWIMG OPTION. Great on my phone. But can't be played anywhere else. Literally tried to watch the Arsenal v Liverpool game right now and the app just loads into the game and then goes back to the screen I was on before clicking on the games stream. So again good for my phone terrible everywhere else.

content: Always crashes. Using my smart TV, this app crashes at least 50% of the time. It's horrible. The only reason I have it is for The Office. Update: the app will now not load at all on any device. I tried all the tricks, and eventually uninstalled it. Now, it won't even reinstall. This app is worthless. It seems to get worse and worse, and they haven't bothered fixing it. All my other streaming apps work fine. It is ONLY Peacock.

content: There is ALWAYS a loading problem, a lag, a buffering issue, and/or random issue when using this app on any of my Samsung smart TVs. Using it on mobile devices is a lot better, but the app STILL has the same problems, occasionally. I have to use Peacock almost daily because of one (daily) show I watch, but it's so annoying that every single time I watch, there is some kind of problem.

content: If I could give it less than one star I definitely would. I love how they keep raising the price but won't fix the problem I've been having. On my Roku TV in the living room, the peacock app will freeze but continue to make sound. And on the device I have in the bedroom it skips forward and backwards. I love how they keep raising the price for the apps that don't work but don't fix the apps. It's a damn shame

Too many ads in Spanish. There are a few good programs but not many. Even as a paid service, there are still ads and over half are in Spanish. I'd understand if I was watching Spanish programs. The other annoying thing is every 30 minutes or so, the picture will fade, almost like snow and the program has to be closed and restarted. It's almost like being back in the 80s with snow and ads.

I only rarely use Peacock (not a huge number of shows I'm interested in) but lately I've been binging Resident Alien and this app has a glaring feature missing: it doesn't seem to tie into whatever media service Android has. Meaning that if you start watching something while you're listening to music in another app, it won't automatically pause that music. Or listen to media controls on your headphones. Or stop playing when your headphones disconnect. It's frustrating.

App needs upgraded. Keep getting an error message when try to use picture in picture. App needs to be upgraded for latest version of Android. It has been 3 weeks since my phone upgraded and since then Peacock freezes and messes up. Have to restart my phone to fix the issue. Edit: since last update working a little better. Edit #2: still freezing occasionally when trying to minimize for picture in picture.
replyContent: Hi Susan. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Has the best, most needed, buffering animation on the web! This app, when casting to Chromecast will actually extend the watch time by as much as 20%. It does this by cleverly freezing a frame and letting you watch a yellow, open circle chase itself for 3-5 seconds at a time. Often, frequently within the same 2-4 minute period of a movie or show. No, it isn't my network - Netflix, Hulu, PBS, etc. get along without any buffering. Peacock, it seems, has severely under-scaled its servers!

The app on my smart TV works great but on my phone it's terrible. It's constantly crashing, resetting. If I have to pause my show and it's paused for too long it'll reset back to the beginning of the episode I was watching so I'll have to fast forward to where I was and watch 2 mins of commercials that I already watched previous before I was paused it. It never saves your spot when u stop watching an episode and turn the app off. It's absolutely terrible and makes me want to cancel my sub
replyContent: We’re sorry to hear about your interrupted experience, Raeleen. We’d like to look into this for you! Please send us an email at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: For $12 a month you would think that the app would open in a normal fashion, videos would play and it wouldn't constantly freeze on the Roku. Hulu, Pluto, Netflix, take your pick they all work fine. Just decided to buy this and bought the ad-free premium and immediately regret it, You'll only get one month from me but maybe hire some better developers? Just keeps getting worse. Clearly another Google scam every review is bad but the rating is great.

content: The app and the service is subpar compared to other streaming apps/services. The user interface is slow to respond, and the content streaming stutters and pauses constantly. I have gigabit fiber, and no other streaming apps/services (netflix, prime, disney+, paramount, etc) ever have an issue. It's been this way for two years.
replyContent: Hi Kane. We would be happy to help you with this. You can reach us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com. We’re here for you!

content: Horrible experience. This app is a rip-off. You can watch for free on free air. I'll be canceling as soon as football playoffs are over with. This app offers nothing new . Just about everything is streamed everywhere, eles for free or better options. This was a promotional event that I should be receiving . The problem is not my provider but it This company . I have already been in contact with them to resolve the issue and found it was this company making things difficult.

Positives: Plays the videos you click on. That's about it. Negative: literally zero customizability. No settings. Biggest omission: no way to turn off auto play. This is criminal. People have data limits. God forbid you ever fall asleep watching a show.. it'll play every single episode forever. And if the series ends? The horror continues as it will auto play a random new show. Absolutely f'ing ridiculous. No option to turn this off, no app check for recent user interaction.

Has three negatives (which is the reason I took away three stars). First is that it starts a show or movie that I have no interest in right after what I was watching and even though I think I back out quick enough, it will show on my "Continue Watching" list. Second, not seeing a way to remove shows from the "Continue Watching" list, especially the ones that start that I didn't want. And third, I hate how it limits the number of shows/movies on "My List". It doesn't show everything I added

I literally have to restart my phone after using the app. My navigation buttons become entirely inoperable. The only way I'm able to get out of the app is to turn the screen off and use a hardware shortcut to open the camera. But even after that, the nav buttons are gone. Honestly, kudos, I've never had an app fubar my phone like this before.
replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, John. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: STILL isn't updated with the latest android system! Don't bother downloading Peacock until they update the app otherwise it's a waste of money. Every time I try to minimize it and go to another app, it just crashes and I have to lock the phone to be able to get the screen to respond again. Every. Single. Time. It's really frustrating. YOU GUYS KNOW IT'S DOING THIS, SO FIX THE PROBLEM!! What's the hold up?!?! We pay you for this app, it should work properly.

This app is really poor. With all of the functionality that can be built into streaming platforms, it seems obvious that NBC is purposefully going on the cheap unless they specifically don't want their viewers to have basic services like rewind in the experience. I will continue regardless because I want the specific content of the premier league, but the day they lose the rights is the day I cancel my service.

Commercials for 5.99 plan are over 60 seconds, and it's freezing in the middle of commercials. When it freezes, you get an error that says generic playback error. My husband account and he is pissed he watches on his phone at work. What I don't understand is how a company goes from free to charging that fast. The movies quality lately is horrible they either don't have sound or freezing. Someone This company needs to explain this!
replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Would give less stars if possible. Everytime I sign in online I have no issues, I try to sign in on this app and it keeps saying "Sorry, we did not recognize either your username or password". I know 100% it is the right username and password because I just logged in online 5 seconds before trying on the app so I cab watch a show. I even went and changed my password just in case of some kind of glitch and still having the same issue. I also know 100% it is being typed in correctly.
replyContent: Hi Jennifer! We’d like to hear more about your experience and investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your account details.

content: This app is terrible. It's been a available for several years, but you *still* can't remove items from Continue Watching except through a dumb workaround. Content will not play for me on the Brave browser. Continue Watching didn't show up on the Home screen on the Chrome browser. The experience using this platform on Roku, web browsers, and devices is bad. You really need to invest more effort in this app if you expect people to continue subscribing to the platform.

Considering I pay for Peacock, I think the 2 1/2 plus mins of ads prior to watching a movie is just a tad bit excessive so minus 1 ⭐ for that reason. I do feel their library is mediocre and definitely needs much newer content but ultimately it's not as bad as some of the more popular streaming services. That said, I won't take away from the fact that the app itself is well designed. Easy to navigate with clean controls and overall nicely done which makes the small negatives quite tolerable.

Plays what you want and plays whatever else it wants you too. Episodes that have been watched will be reverted to unwatched making shows queue up that I've already seen. You cannot turn off auto play so when a show ends if you now have shows you don't want to watch in your continue watching. No ability to remove shows from continue watching. Frustrating price increases without additional features.

Very difficult to navigate the site. Also requires a lot of bandwidth. The app doesn't know or fails to access my WiFi eventhough the speed t ranges between 500 & 700 Mbps & all other apps, YouTube TV, etc has no issues. This app even has issues with trying to upgrade to Premium Plus so that I can see if downloading will help. Unlike YT TV, & other apps, you can't rewind to bypass ads or rewatch a scene/sports play. This is one reason I'm trying to upgrade. SIMPLY PUT, THIS APP IS TERRIBLE.

Currently struggles to do PIP. Used to be you could hit the home button while watching something and it would open in a small moveable screen so you could keep using your device. Randomly that feature now only works about 5% of the time and when it doesn't, the app locks up so badly it'll lock the phone up. Other than that I like the app, but this is a pretty big deal breaker.
replyContent: We’re sorry to hear about your interrupted experience, Matt. We’d like to look into this for you! Please send us an email at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: no remove continue watching. if you accidentally click something it's just there unless you go to last episode and skip to the end. that just about instantly starts something else you don't want to watch repeat process. no option to turn off auto play to inflate their numbers. ad plan glitches so much will make you watch ad twice or start over show.

The app will not cast to any Google nest devices anymore. Furthermore, I cannot add shows to my favorites anymore. I get an error every time I try to add it to my list. I've Uninstalled and reinstalled with no luck. I've cleared the cache etc. No luck. And now if I'm streaming on my phone in landscape mode, I can no longer toggle in between screens while it's streaming. Please fix!
replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Until a few weeks ago, I used to be able to watch it picture in picture on my screen on my Samsung but now it attempts to make the little screen, flickers, and glitches. I have to turn my phone off and then close the app. If I can no long use the app as a little box on my screen while I am doing other things on my phone, the app is really useless to me. Please fix this.
replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Jamie. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Update Nov 2023: App is doing much better. Now I want the $1.99 deal. Peacock was fine for a solid year from my Chromebook. I enjoyed the content but too short a time (it was great), UNTIL....a year& more, app unable to open from anything but Android my phone...pitiful. No Chromebook. Unrelenting crashing, immediate, buffering, errors, no casting w/every single launch attempt.

As a lot of people have said, the audio description just kicked on after a month of using the app. I attempted to reach out to support and got disconnected with no fix. I am baffled that this has been going on for 2 years and they haven't found a fix. Like many reviews this only happens on certain shows.

This app does not play nicely with casting to TV (chrome cast). It constantly crashes/freezes while casting and needs the app to be forced stopped and restarted to have a -chance- at resuming function. It also lacks quality of life features that many other media apps (hulu, prime video, etc.) have. This isn't the worst media app I have used (that honor goes to the history channel app) but this comes close.
replyContent: Hi James! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Way too many ads. Other streaming apps such as Netflix keeps the captions up no matter what I watch, such as movies or a series. With peacock, I have to turn the captions on for every new episode. Also when I watch something in my vehicle by the way of Bluetooth it won't let me pause on the radio screen. Other apps will allow that.

There is no real way to get help when you need it specifically about billing. I tried for months to contact you all and nothing. in addition, I was paying for months but was not able to watch it because of your poor set up/accounts. I ONLY renewed because you all had a very cheap deal and my children love many shows on here.
replyContent: Hello Johnni. We would be happy to help you with this. You can reach us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com. We’re here for you!

content: Signed up premium ad free. First thing is 55sec Ad! Ads before during and after all viewing. No option to turn off the auto play. Ad and sponsor TV continue to stream long after you've put your phone down or gone to bed. App consumes more battery and data than any other streaming services. This app like many others doesn't have ad free subscriptions.

It worked fine for me until 1/1/2024 when my phone updated to the newest Android os. Now when I minimize the playing screen my home and back buttons don't work and my whole phone locks up. I also get a box on my screen saying that the Peacock app isn't optimized to work with this operating system. It would be decent if Peacock app addressed this issue, since there are other people experiencing it and we pay monthly for the service.

content: I love the contact however I pay for the premium service yet I have commercials on every show I watch and it's as bad as watching regular TV. I don't mind the commercials if it was like other subscribers where you have a few at the beginning and a few at the end. I would also not mind a few in the middle but I watch as many commercial as regular TV and it's the same darn commercials over and over again. Very disappointing.

I dont know whats going on, but lately the app keeps glitching and crashing. ESPECIALLY on Roku. The channels just stop, the picture freezes while the voices still play, its gotten SO TERRIBLE. Super annoying, and has made me stop watching. Thinking of deleting. Too bad, it used to be one of the better TV apps.

For some reason and idk if it's just me but sometimes when I'm watching a movie it sometimes abruptly skips to a different scene but the audio stays intact. I try to close the app, reinstall it, restart my phone but nothing works and it's super annoying. It might be just me but if it isn't than that's a huge oversight.

Have to watch a ton of ads at the beginning, fast forward to the end then in the last 10 seconds, you have to watch another ton of ads. I enjoy the content. the app itself needs work. The most annoying part of the app is that if you don't watch something for a week it is removed from your Continue watching list. It is a very stupid decision they've made. On roku the peacock app is slow and very clunky.

Will randomly stop the show I'm watching some part through the episode and just switch to another show I've never watched and usually it's something I would never watch by choice. content: Glitches a lot with Chromecast. Connection gets stuck and program freezes until you open another streaming app. NEED the option to turn off autoplay and to remove shows from "continue watching". I've fallen asleep watching a show, autoplay runs thru and starts a new show that I never wanted to watch sits on continue watching and now it's forever there. Show collection is ok and ads are not too intrusive compared to other apps.

Awful! Why do I have to pay $12 without advertising but if I pay $6 i get advertising? Like they don't make enough! I will cancel after 1 month. All they have is the office and parks and rec. Worst streaming service I've paid for! You make enough to not charge double for no advertising. You cost as much as netflix if not more for no advertising and less of a selection

DO NOT PAY FOR THIS!!! It's been a horrible, tedious experience and I will not be renewing my subscription. The constant trouble opening, loading and using the app is egregious. I can't believe I paid for something that I can't use!? What's the point!!! I'll find my shows on platforms where it actually works.

The "continue watching" is often missing and it doesn't allow me to go to the show's menu from there like other apps do. If I minimize the screen, it wont play the next episode like other apps, it just shuts down. Also, it's the only app that doesn't allow my headphones to pause/play what I'm watching.

Shows get removed from the continued watching.The watched shows always get reset and don't show what's new. Good content, bad app, plus no way turn off auto play. Now it only shows me half of my stuff in saved list. Also the move and tv are all in one are in my stuff makes it hard to find show or movie without scrolling through my stuff that is not showing half of it. This app needs a fix even Max app works better

Frustrating experience, the ads are truly annoying, used to other streaming services that don't contain ads but what really makes this service a downer is the constant stuttering after ads. I need to back out of show then go back in and wait for the picture to get clear again. I don't have this issue with any of the other streaming services. If things don't improve I'll be canceling and stick to the services that work without these annoying issues.

If it works, it's Fantastic! Like many others, I am trying to decide whether to cancel or just keep trying. I have multiple devices that this just will not connect to open. Other apps are absolutely fine, but this, is maddening!! Doesn't seem to matter if it's an android, Roku or Amazon device. If it doesn't open, it's worthless. Apple TV and Disney+ also had similar issues in the beginning and have since somehow updated and fixed them. PeacockTV, it's your turn.
replyContent: Hi Paul! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Great selection of shows and movies and some live sports in 4K. However, the buffering issues are frustrating. This is not my internet which is 400mbps. No other streaming service does this. Just Peacock and they need to fix this. Support is horrible. The first chat, I was told to try some things and I would get an email to continue after trying them. I never got the email.  The second chat disconnected me after we started troubleshooting.

Oh for crying out loud, i literally can't even watch anything on this app. The app was working perfectly fine for the past few days i've had it and it works well on the TV. This app was my go-to for when i wanted to watch something netflix or hulu didn't have, which is a lot unfortunately. Now all of a sudden when i try to watch anything it tells me peacock has stopped working. Plus 30-40 minutes in it often kicks you out of a show saying an error has occured. So annoying, please fix.
replyContent: Hello! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: I love the app. They have many great shows, movies, and sports, including my favorite, Primer League. Occasionally, it has a few seconds of glitching. At first, I thought it was my internet, but after talking with a friend at work (who also has the app), he experiences the same glitching. It's only occasional and resolves quickly, not a big deal. My only real problem is that I can not remove items from my continue watching tab. This seems to be a common issue with everyone and needs a fix.

Low quality in a variety of ways. Use the app on my samsung phone & hp laptop. The quality is pretty poor for a company like NBC. One of the features is 10 seconds forward or backward. Freezes EVERY time. Have to close the app & restart it it. Sometimes it takes me back to where i was, sometimes it starts from the beginning. The background music drowned out the commentators for the sports i watch. If you are behind when broadcast finishes, you're SOL. And replays are not immediately available.

Gave it a one star in 2021, 3 stars in 2022 and unfortunately it's stuck at 3 stars. It's not unusable like before, but it's definitely not enjoyable to use. If they are going to buy up football games and force us to watch through their app, they need to improve their product. Simple navigation, fast forwarding, inability to start from the beginning without rewinding, just a ton of features that virtually every other worthwhile streaming platform has at this point.
replyContent: Hi Grant! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Peacock! Still the number one streaming app to most likely crash, freeze, glitch, get stuck, and absolutely not work. No matter what your device and/or internet's abilities are. And good luck on the closed captioning fully working for those of us who are hearing impaired. I know that this is a stupid, privileged complaint/review, and really, who cares! But wow, NBC.
replyContent: Hello! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: I suscribe to this to watch cycling and winter Olympic sports, which they no longer show) but it is often an extremely frustrating ordeal. The app is frequently buffering and or crashing, and then, of course, is the issue of paying for the highest price tier and still getting ads. It is an insult to the intelligence of its suscribers! It's taking all of the joy out of watching one's favorite sports.

This app is overall good. But whenever I push play, it loads for 5 minutes then it skips ahead. This is annoying😡 PLEASE FIX. And whenever I pause it, it continues to play until it loads then it pauses. I might have delete this app, which is very frustrating. Because peacock has a lot of great shows and movies that I really enjoy. Please fix those errors ASAP.

This app is horrible! We like to watch the live News in the morning. We only have the app running on two devices at a time but the app won't work when we change from one TV to another. It keeps saying we have too many devices streaming. Why won't it automatically shut down a stream when you log off?? We always have to force stop the app in order to watch on a new device. We use Chromecast and android phones. Fix the app please.

"Audio Description" Bug The mobile app is janky and buggy (freezes, crashes, etc.) but the TV app is no better. On ChromeCast, Hisense Android TVs, and NVIDIA Shields there's a bug where EVERY SINGLE EPISODE of a show will default to narrating everything on screen with "audio descriptions." This bug has been well known for THREE WHOLE YEARS and they won't fix it. What's worse is that it's a super easy bug to fix, as someone who's dabbled in programming. I'm canceling my subscription.
replyContent: Hello Dylan! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: It used to be fine. Now it gives me a heart attack every time it freezes and crashes my phone. The audio plays but no picture displays and when I try to close the app my screen goes dark and doesn't respond to my touch and I just have to press the power button and pray. I've done all of the trouble shooting necessary, with no results. Very disappointed because I was in the middle of binge watching the vampire diaries for the very first time

It took a full 40 minutes to get the app to work. It just kept freezing. I can't help but feel that if you're charging me to watch a match, least you can do is provide a way to reliably watch said match. Missing half of a game trying to configure and troubleshoot an app isn't it. After restarting my phone and uninstalling, reinstalling. And then restarting again, I did manage to see the second half.

pros:lots of FREE variety and content in general. it's not like other apps where the free content is limited lame or only pre 2000's. great selection of shows and movies. they even have exclusive releases (still for free!) of new movies. the ads are all 90 seconds(that's shorter than "regular TV" for all you only streamers lol). cons: tho the ads are only 90 seconds, they dont have many so it's quite repetitive. half the time I try to save something to my list an error message pops up. pros>cons

I hate that it doesn't scroll smoothly, that it wants to jump to certain points. Also it will start playing something you've never watched, or ask you to start playing without telling you what you'd be starting, and once a series is started, you can't remove it from "continue watching" until you complete it. There's no way to abandon a show you accidentally started or don't like. And previews for shows and movies won't play, but the actual shows she movies play fine.

The app works but is missing several features that I'd expect from a streaming app these days. It can't play/pause from Bluetooth devices like headphones which is a must for me. It seems to use an obscene amount of data compared to other streaming apps. It loses your place when you leave the app. This is very frustrating with ads though I don't think it happens as much now.
replyContent: Hello Josh! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: Peacock used to be my favorite app for streaming Chicago Fire, Chicago P. D and Law & Order Series. I'll give them one star ⭐ for the variety of drama content. On the other hand, even the best content means Nothing If the app just freezes up and won't play the videos!!! It Only works about half of the time and then it just buffers when I try to resume the video later that day. I have tried every troubleshooting step many times and it's garbage! Don't waste your time with tech support either!

there is no way to remove things from the "continue watching" area. also there is no way to turn off auto play. so if you miss your chance at the end of a show you now have to permanently deal with shows you have no interest in clogging up your queue. not a huge deal with a movie because you can fast forward to end, but every time a new episode on a series comes out, it comes right back finally all of this would be almost acceptable if they weren't the ONLY streaming service that doesn't do it

I've been enjoying the pay app version of Peacock for almost a couple years now, and for the reasonable price point they're asking, they are totally worth keeping all year round. The app itself is reliable. The movie offerings are pretty good, considering. And the large catalog of shows is great. When I eventually start trimming back on the streaming services, Peacock will likely be the last to go (unless they get greedy between now and then).

I've tried it so many times thinking maybe they'd fix all the issues... but nope. Zero subtitles when streaming on smart TV. You have to cast from your phone to have them. Movies that have other languages in them for certain parts (take John wick for example) - no translation/subtitles available. You miss the entire premise for the show! I can't, worthless, completly and totally

Local news won't be local if you have Starlink for an Internet provider. Should be Portland, OR and it comes up Seattle, WA. With no option available to manually change this, I tried to contact help through "Help". What a joke. Unless you happen to need one of the few, specific help options to choose from. Also having trouble restarting my subscription after I cancelled it out of frustration. Takes me to the play store and there's no option to restart, no valid options whatsoever.

The content available is pretty cool and I like the new shows as well. However, I believe I should get some of my premium subscription refunded. Two reasons: 1.) Downloads require and Internet connection. In no app does a download require an Internet connection. 2.) I was told I am to be commercial free, however commercials have snuck in quite a few times. I believe Peacock negotiated in bad faith with me on the deal. It feels as if they cut the budget on their technology.

After recent update I can't watch shows keeps saying fatal playback error. I can watch commercials and trailers though. Is that what I am paying for!?? Well, I emailed them like they asked and nothing was accomplished, aapparently I am paying to just watch commercials and trailers because everything else keeps saying fatal playback error and their answer is to uninstall and redownload the app. I've done it several times. Why don't they want to fix the issue?
replyContent: Hello James. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: I got this app to watch on my Sony bravia 4k TV. I noticed it wasn't playing 4k and dolby content in 4k or dolby. Autoplay sucks. You hesitate even for a second and another movie plays. content: I have been a customer since the beginning premium. Recently they decided to make closed captioning the default so every time you turn on the app you have to turn off subtitles every time you go from one television to another you have to turn off subtitles every time there's a new show you have to turn off subtitles I am told there's no way to permanently turn them off now IT made a big mistake thinking anyone is going to do that I just canceled . What a shame was a great app.

Five Thumbs! DOWN. 👎👎👎👎👎 Bottom line, it's 3 years later and this is still a pay-only app. AND according to the few reviews at the top there are still a LOT of issues with quality. I saw the ad (in GP) for "The Contenental" and assumed it was a loss leader, so installed the app, but was dissapointed to find that I wasn't able to view it w/my old account. Even more so, you only have 2 plans to choose from. $6 a month, or $12 a month. As in 2020, I UNinstalled it, moments after INstalling it.

content: Wasn't bad until they added more ads. The added ads after pausing a show or movie pop up to fast. I'll pause to read some subtitles that pop up or pause to grab a drink and well guess what, ads interrupt well im trying to read what was said & have to back out just to unpause the show. It's so annoying, I think I'm dropping this service after I watch the last couple of episodes. Also everyone I load the app it has an error then I have to reload it.

The most unreliable and inconsistent streaming app I've used. I've had issues with buffering, random freezing, content not loading, etc. It's a shame considering Peacock's content is incredible. content: Really sick of the fact that there is no way to turn off auto play in the app. Also, if you do happen to fall asleep while it's playing, you can move a series back to the episode you were on, however after you finish that episode it will automatically move you back to the episode you made it to. For example, I fell asleep on s2 ep 10, but it made it to s4 ep 1 while I was asleep. Now, I moved it back to complete s2 ep 10, it finishes that episode, and jumps to s4 ep 2 on its own. Really horrible

3 THINGS NEEDED FOR PERFECT 5 STARS. 1-Remove from Watch History option, or at very least a way to turn off up next for movies so you don't have garbage you hate in your queue. 2- Synced progress on devices. If I watch on my phone, then go to my TV or Echo device, many times it is not the same place I stopped. 3- Option to skip only 10-15 seconds rather than playing the FF/Rewind game over and over. Fix these 3 things and this app is flawless.

I've never had an app that glitches as much as this one. Constantly out of sync with audio. While watching an episode will start buffering and then just exit. I have the highest speed of Internet and it doesn't matter for this app! I don't even care how the show I was binge watching ends anymore. It has a few decent movies and shows but you will not be able to watch a whole movie through nor a full episode without experiencing the glitches. Peacock just saving us money for other streaming apps

content: I have an Android and I was having the same issue that many other people have had with picture-in-picture. Another reviewer commented that you need to go into your app settings & indicate you want Peacock "on top". No other streaming apps with picture-in-picture seem to have this setting, but Peacock does. Go to Settings > Apps > Peacock > Appear On Top > Choose "Allow Permission". This solved the issue for me.
replyContent: Hi Jessica. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We would love to investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your device and account details. We look forward to hearing from you!

content: I can't believe I fell for the NFL Playoff game greedy money grab! Not only did I give in to purchasing the app just to watch a regularly viewed NFL game but when I watched it on the PeeCOCK app, it was spotty, buffering and froze up many times. I have 1 gig internet and never have issues watching every other NFL game even when I'm streaming without wifi!! I ended up turning the game off before it was over and felt foolish for subscribing. Doesn't really work, continue watching doesn't work whatsoever on two devices, like most younger people use. Phone and TV. I have to keep track of where I'm at on the phone, then relaunch on TV, watch the ads for the movie again, then fast forward to where I'm at. Not... functional...

I really wish Bluetooth controls worked. I can raise and lower the volume, but I can't pause or play the movies. Tried it with two different phones and three different Bluetooth headphones and none worked correctly. Other than that it's great.

I can't manage the continue watching section.... some shows play automatically, even though I did not choose them. Seemingly, the algorithm chooses it for you, and if you don't get to the remote in time.....oh, well, it's there until you watch the entire series or movie.

The ads and trying to get rid of shows off my "continue" section is a no go... And then the ads they play are the same thing over and over... So I payed the extra $6 to get rid of them... But unlike paramount+ they don't falsely advertise "no ads/commercials" and then pretend to care by saying it's only "our" ads not other ads... I'M PAYING FOR NO ADS! INCLUDING YOURS! IDGAF!

Peacock has been charging me for their service, but I can't gain access to any movies or live sports. content: I figured out how to resolve the picture-in-picture playback on Android devices! To fully allow pucture on picture on Android: go to phone settings -> apps -> Peacock -> APPEAR ON TOP [ON]. No more glitches and continues playing my show even when doing other things on my phone!!

Really a terrible app for the money you pay, you can't really fast forward or rewind, if you pause the live feed, you will get kicked off as soon as the live feed ends. If you are watching a sporting event, it will kick you off randomly, so you end up missing plays. It's very glitchy

Worst streaming app for viewer control. Specifically live sports. Way too many ads. TOO MANY ADS. Cannot control fast forward and/ or rewind. Also, so many glitches. Love the content but if I leave even a second of a show unwatched it shows up in my "Continue Watching" category. The only reason I leave a few seconds is bc if I don't, it automatically starts a new show immediately. Updated 2022: New episodes of NBC shows are suddenly not available next day on premium. Another reason to switch back to hulu!

I would rate this app higher but it seems like a scam to me, y'all advertise free TV and movies but only a select few things are actually free, seems you have to actually pay for a subscription in order to watch 3/4 of the stuff on there, seems to be a waste of time to me. content: I LOVE this app so far! I found it cause I wanted to watch American Pickers. Netflix after the first covid shutdown went to garbage. After looking through the library and seeing how much content is actually on here with only 60 sec ads it was game on for the lowest price package. It would be nice if it would stop playing after a few episodes cause i fall asleep watching sometimes but until then ill just keep guessing. It streams from my phone to tv perfectly. Sometimes ad free episodes!!!

I have problems with it skipping parts of shows after the commercial on both my tv and my phone, quite annoying! Plus I finally found a great show but can only watch 1 episode for free??? Yeah I think not! Too bad its got a stellar cast on it. How dare you say its free then want us to pay to watch it when we have a pandemic going on??????

content: One of the worse apps to use. A cluttered visual field/junk pile of shows to tediously navigate through. Icons are difficult to read-pointlessly wordy small print (often white print on white background). If you subscribe to Peacock or Peacock Premium you will be paying for the subscription and the 'privilege' of being inundated with commercials breaks (often 5 commercials per break). Olympic coverage is not international just narrowly focused on USA. You can get better Olympic coverage on Youtube for free. And Amber Ruffin.

I downloaded this app only to be able to watch the office. This app is horrible. It's slow, shuts down in the middle of a show and gives error codes without a proper method to actually report the error! Why take a show from a streaming site that actually works properly only to move it to a subpar platform that most can't access and are right to not access because it's not worth the monthly costs. Bad business Universal Studios!
replyContent: Hey Lydia! We would be happy to help you with this. You can reach us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com. We’re here for you!

content: Frustrating because I don't have subtitles on but I'm getting an audio description for every scene, there is no option to turn this off I would very much like to turn this off. So they update the app and now it won't even start. Great job!

A great streaming App. Probably the best I've tried. I actually got the Premium Membership for $5/month, which gives you access to every Movie, Series, & Pay-Per-View available on Peacock. One of the best things about the Premium membership, is that for most movies, I only have to watch 1-2min of Ads before the movie & then no interuptions during the movie.

Using Chromecast, some things work, many do not. Yep, lots and lots of content but not sure if I want to jump through numerous hoops every time to find something and then cross my fingers that what I pick will actually cast. But it's day 1... improvement is needed.

Starts auto-playing a random movie right when the credits begin rolling for the movie you're currently watching and gives you no option to stop it. I literally cannot watch credits when casting. Really kills the mood at the end of the movie when I can't listen to the music and process what I just watched.

Horrible app. Can't pause it without it restarting an episode from the beginning and you have to watch the ads all over again. content: What an absolute piece of garbage. Ads every couple of minutes, even when paying to not see ads. Worst video player ever. Can't see when fast forwarding or rewinding, something even VCRs could do. Terrible layout. I could write a book about it. Cancelled and won't be back.

Not nearly at the level of capability, you would expect from an NBC resource. Especially when they offer "exclusive" live content :(.

The absolute worst streaming service. You pay their monthly fee for the two whole shows they have and you still have to sit through 120 seconds of ads every four minutes. Want ad free? You'll have to pay Netflix money without getting any of the Netflix content. Literally terrible by every conceivable metric. Hey NBC, when you pull your head from your greedy asses, let me know.

This has all of the shows I love and many more coming soon! I have high hopes for the future of Peacock even if it has started off to a rocky start. But I have some ideas to make the app better: - Download for offline streaming - Having it to work with Fire TV - More shows and movies and the time the future movies would come out.

content: Works well. I don't usually watch much on the free version as I don't really watch much TV anyway. I do like that I can pick up and drop Premium, at a reasonable cost, so that I can watch certain sporting events like rugby and football world cups etc.

I had to check the reviews to see if it was just my devices. I now see everyone has the same annoying issues. The app constantly closes in the middle of programs. It constantly freezes and has a delayed responses. I'm cancelling my subscription.

The app itself has improved since it's launch, though it is still not the best streaming service out there. Recently, the ability to cast Peacock content to a Nest Hub has started to fail. I will update this review if this is fixed. I'm inclined to cancel my service if this isn't resolved though...

Though I originally planned on keeping Peacock for just the length of the 2020(21) Sumer Olympics, since then in the following months I've found it to be worth keeping for their offerings of sports, movies, and some shows. And since they're not greedy with the cost, I think they make a reasonable price-point. Good enough to call an ongoing keeper. 👍

content: I love this app. For basically $10 per month, I get access to my favorite shows, without commercials. I have done so much binge watching and they are constantly adding new shows. I also love that it has all the seasons of Snapped, and Top Chef. It's a really good app. I never run out of things to watch.

Also there isn't even close to the amount of content the network had. I paid for this until July and then I'm canceling it unless it drastically changes.
replyContent: Hi! We appreciate your feedback. We will begin rolling out WWE content on March 18th and will continually be adding WWE Network content to the library, making the entire WWE Network archive available to stream on-demand on Peacock Premium before SummerSlam. You can reach us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com if you need anything else.

content: With 6 wks to go on my yr sub they finally added platforms I use like Samsung smart tv and Fire stick. Worst app ever. Will not run off cellular data. What's the point? Until this runs with only cellular I'm canceling my subscription. Very disappointed do not pay a dime. Get Amazon or something else that works.

Has good content but live content buffers way too often. Can't enjoy a game or any live content, without it buffering every 2 minutes. My internet speeds are amazing and no other streaming service in my house buffers the way peacock does.

I signed up for peacock so that I could watch Yellowstone in a couple of other series. I paid the introductory price $5 or whatever thinking that I would just have to sit through some normal ads. Now I'm debating whether or not I'm going to pay the extra $7 per month just so that I don't have to watch all the gay ads and HIV ads that I'm having to watch every 5 minutes while watching Yellowstone. It is F'ing disgusting.

I pay monthly to watch TV and it plays the show I choose. Pretty straightforward. Nothing fancy. Decent selection of shows and movies. Mostly not laggy. All around ok and does it's job. RokuTV app is my main but the phone app is great on the go. No complaints and that's all you can ask for these days really.

I requested free television options, and this was third on the list. I opened the app, and it said choose a plan, both of which cost miney. So, I deleted it and removed the account. However, I read more into details and realized we're told we have no way to request our information be removed entirely. Wow. 1. This is very disappointing and should not pop up on free search through Google Play Store if it's not free. 2. Why can't we request that our information be removed if we must use a cc?
yeah totally trash now with constant glitch pausing for no reason, I have good internets and all other video apps working great

Of all the major streaming platforms, this is by far the worst. It uses 3-5x as much data for the same thing as the others. Lately, I can't even get videos to load on peacock more often than not, while hulu and netflix work fine. I feel swindled for spending money on such a terrible service.

Constant freezing (spinning yellow circle) and blurry, pixelated video. That never happens with other similar phone apps like Hulu or Paramount+, so it isn't my devices. User interface is frustrating and non-intuitive compared to those apps too, with no good help files.

content: I subscribed to watch the Olympics, initially. Was not impressed with the coverage and the spoilers in the app were frustrating. It is the first video service that feels like it takes the best of Social media and music streaming sites, and incorporates it into one simply amazing app. Now we need picture in picture mode for this to attain perfection. At $5 per month? That's simply unbelievable! I'm sure you guys must be warming up to charge people more.

amazing service always has the best movies to choice from with

content: The product itself (great TV shows) is good, but the app design and user interface reminds me of Netflix over a decade ago. Few options, buggy, terrible menu and browsing navigation. I'm looking forward to this app improving in the future.

I got this app specifically to watch The Office and it doesn't even auto play. I'm not paying 10 bucks a month to push the play button every 22 minutes. I don't even see a place to adjust that setting and there's captions on everything! Not everyone cares for captions. Fix your app.

Add for a movie that I wanted to see brought me to peacock and said free. I downloaded app and guess what, to even enter you have to sign up and pick a payment plan....Used to be free. Back to TUBI, uninstalling Peacock

Pissed off that I pay for this app but when I watch WrestleMania...... I should be able to see EVERYTHING they have on it. Yet instead, I have to watch commercials. I understand watching ads during regular shows and movies. But during a live stream, I pay for it. I should get to see ALL OF IT.

Pros: Easy to use, clean interface, free. Cons: Biggest issue is how LOUD ads are compared to the volume of the movie/show you are watching. Better than the typical free streaming service but riddled with minor issues that make it so you wont use this app.

Many programs have audio description set as default and you have to manually turn it off at the beginning of every episode. Extremely annoying. No option in settings to disable that feature. App isn't very well designed in that regard.

I don't know why all the bad reviews. Maybe because of phone compatibility, I don't know. Either way, it works perfect for us on our Galaxy A7 tablet. We watch Peacock on our computers and the XBox and I wanted to see what all the fuss was about and all the 1-Star reviews for the App. If you have a tablet running Android, I think it should work just fine, like it does for us.

Worst service I've ever seen. Basically you're paying $6 a month just for NBC, no extras and all of the commercials. You can't forward or reverse on ATV. They think they're being clever by snatching up an Astros game. I paid a one time fee of $6 to watch 1 baseball game; plan to cancel immediately.
Absolutely no reason an app/streaming platform with a monthly subscription THAT COSTS MONEY should have ads. Its absolutely bull.

App works ok but I can't watch from my laptop because I have an external monitor. Definitely not paying for a useless service. No other app has an issue with using an external app. This is what happens when a cable company has no clue why people stream content. Definitely better options out there than this.

Love it, so many of my shows are on here, and did i mention it's free?! I have had no technical issues thus far. All audio has synced, video is good quality, have no problems running the app on my phone or the site on my laptop. So glad they did this!

At first this app was great. I watched the first 3 seasons of Downton Abbey but going into the 4th season the app started freezing up. I've paid for the premium package and my WiFi works just fine in everything else. Now Peacock won't stream any shows. I'm very unhappy with it. Very, very unhappy

The only issue I have with it at the moment is that if I receive a phone call and I am watching a TV show on peacock when I go back to watch the show I have to start at the beginning again. replyContent: Hello! We’d like to hear more about your experience and investigate this further. Please email us at peacockfeedback@help.peacocktv.com with your account details.
